Comment me faire repérer et suivre par l: How to be identified and followed by companies
Compléter votre profil au maximum vous p: Completing your profile as much as possible allows you to be better referenced in the [startup directory=/directories/startups] and in the recommendation engine. You can also search directly in the [company directory=/directories/corporations], follow them and contact their employees. BONUS TIPS : Don't forget to complete your Wishlist of companies, you will appear directly in their suggestions of startups
Forinov, c'est gratuit pour les startups: Forinov is free for startups. Whether it's to list your startup, contact members or respond to [calls for applications=/directories/opportunities/1]
Lors de [l'inscription=/onboarding], vou: During [registration=/onboarding], you will have to choose between startups or companies (SME, ETI or large Group). The startup profile is free and allows you to reference your solutions, contact companies and respond to [opportunities (calls for projects, etc.)=/directories/opportunities]. The company profile is used to identify, follow and share a portfolio of startups between collaborators, to launch calls for applications and to manage your network of startups and partners. This more advanced profile is subject to a fee depending on the number of users and calls for applications you wish to use
Il existe trois types de comptes et donc: There are three types of accounts and therefore three distinct directories: [startups=/directories/startups], [companies=/directories/corporations] and [partners=/directories/partners] (incubators, investors, etc.). On each profile, you will be able to contact active members. For example, on the profile of a large group, you can find the person in charge of relations and partnerships with startups, the marketing director or the innovation and CSR director. In short, all the people who are looking for innovative solutions and are able to sign with startups
Nous avons créé Forinov pour simplifier: We created Forinov to simplify relationships and collaborations between startups, companies and partners. Forinov brings together decision-makers and project leaders on the same platform and allows the need for innovation to meet the offer. On Forinov, you access and contact the right people, you are alerted to the needs published by companies and can respond directly. The purpose is to save time for everyone and to avoid prospecting via email or Linkedin, which requires too much energy and 'spam' for few results
Lancez vos appels à candidatures, trouve: Launch your calls for applications, find the best solutions, develop and manage your network of startups and partners in a few clicks

Comment Forinov peut m'aider à m'informe: How Forinov can help me learn and innovate
Forinov c'est une plateforme 3 en 1.<br>:
Forinov is a 3-in-1 platform.

- The first network of innovative actors that connects startups, partners and companies.
- A call for applications platform to find the best startups.
- A solution to simplify and centralize all the follow-up of your relationships and projects (SURM)
À quelle typologie d'entreprises s'adres: What type of companies does Forinov address
Forinov permet à toutes les entreprises: Forinov allows all companies (SMEs, ETIs, large groups) seeking to innovate and capitalize on the innovative ecosystem to have a simple and intuitive solution to manage and monitor their projects
Quelles sont les informations publiques: What are the public and private information
Les informations publiques (visibles par:
The public information (visible to all our members), is the information you provide on your company and personal profile.

We provide you with information that allows you to identify your company and understand its challenges and needs in terms of innovation (year of creation, description, sector, number of employees, etc). Most of the other information is private and only accessible by you and your collaborators (who follows you, the files received, your comments on the relationship management or during the evaluation of startups or the messages you can send by private message)
Quels sont les tarifs pour mon entrepris: What are the rates for my business
Les taris dépendent du nombre d'utilisat: Rates depend on the number of users and the number of opportunities you want to publish. Our business rates start at 300 euros per month, or 3600 euros per year. Feel free to [contact us=/contact] to request a demo and our rates, adjusted to your needs
Comment entrer en contact avec des start: How to get in touch with startups and develop my network
Pour contacter des startups et développe:
To contact startups and develop your network, it's very simple! !

1- You can search for startups in the directory and then, from their profile, contact members of their team directly, via secure messaging.
2 - You can follow and add startups to your portfolio. This allows you to classify them in thematic folders, to follow their news or to keep track of the progress of your relationships (status, note taking, follow-up of meetings, documents sent, etc.) .)
3 - By creating an opportunity (call for applications, competition, etc.) you will receive applications from startups, both internal and external to the Forinov network. In a few clicks, you select the most relevant ones and continue the exchanges with them. The platform keeps a history of applications and evaluations to allow you to follow the evolution of startups over time and save you time
Partagez vos appels à candidatures, cont: Share your calls for applications, contact the best startups and partners! Make yourself known within the ecosystem. Forinov is the solution that makes your network grow

Quelle est la valeur ajoutée pour un inc: What is the added value for an incubator / accelerator

Pourquoi publier mes appels à candidatur: Why publish my calls for applications, contests, etc. on Forinov
Comment inviter et mettre en avant mes s: How to invite and promote my startups on Forinov
Forinov permet de simplifier toutes vos:
Forinov allows you to simplify all your dealings with innovation players, and in particular to :

- to highlight and/or find startups in all sectors.
- Follow their evolution and simplify the follow-up of your relationships (portfolio follow-up, alumni, etc.).
- Develop your network and directly reach key contacts (startups, companies, partners).
- Make business connections in a few clicks and follow the projects!

For the startups members of your Forinov network, it is :

- A gain of visibility with their future customers and in all search engines.
- Concrete business opportunities: direct access to the needs published by companies (large groups, ETIs and SMEs) and to decision-makers within companies.
- A simple way to stay informed of your news and that of your network
Pour les investisseurs, Forinov représen:
For investors, Forinov offers several advantages:

- Identify new startups and evaluate their potential via their comprehensive Forinov profiles, then contact them directly.
- Publish calls for applications, receive relevant files and study them thanks to a simplified and customizable dealflow system.
- Add the startups you are interested in to your portfolio of startups and follow their progress so you don't miss any opportunities or news!
- Contact directly the leaders and decision makers of startups and companies to develop your network.
- Facilitate business connections between your participants and their future customers
Forinov leur permet de gagner en visibil: Forinov allows them to gain visibility, find and contact future clients or respond to calls for projects. By updating their profile, they save precious time, gain visibility with their prospects and share their progress with their entire ecosystem, including you! They can follow the companies that interest them and be notified of new opportunities that match their solutions. Forinov is much more efficient for them than prospecting by email or on Linkedin
Publier et gérer vos appels à candidatur:
Publishing and managing your calls for applications on Forinov saves time, efficiency and reputation!

- Time because publishing a call for applications is done in a few clicks. As a bonus, candidates also save precious time by auto-filling 17 fields in their profile.
- Efficiency with a simple and intuitive evaluation and dealflow monitoring tool! You can keep track of the history and evolution of all candidates, successful or not!
- And in terms of notoriety, because all the startups already registered that meet your criteria will be notified, your opportunity will be referenced in the directory of opportunities and you will benefit from our communication relays (networks, newspapers, etc.).

Also, our teams can help you source and pre-qualify your startups, whether they are registered or not. Forinov is the ideal place to centralize all your files, your contacts and especially to receive the best candidates.
Après votre [inscription=/onboarding] su: After your [registration/onboarding] on the platform, it will be possible to invite startups to join you via email invitation or the platform. Once they are members, you will be able to follow them and put them forward on your profile, for example in a folder called 'our nuggets of the moment', 'our alumni' or 'our participants'. A beautiful and up-to-date showcase of your starupts! In addition to the visibility and the possibility of exchanging simply with you (discussion groups, etc.), your startups will have access to all the [opportunities=/directories/opportunities] in progress and to our members. This will help their business to take off.
Pourquoi publier une opportunité sur For: Why publish an opportunity on Forinov and not elsewhere
Qui peut publier une opportunité sur For: Who can post an opportunity on Forinov
Qui peut voir et candidater à mon opport: Who can see and apply for my opportunity
Comment candidater à une opportunité: How to apply for an opportunity
Il y a cinq types d'opportunités : les [:
There are five types of opportunities: [calls for applications=/directories/opportunities/callsforproposals], [competitions and challenges=/directories/opportunities/contestsandchallenges], [coaching programs=/directories/opportunities/followshipprograms], [events=/directories/opportunities/events] and [exclusive offers=/directories/opportunities/exclusiveoffers].

Calls for applications are published by companies and partners in order to receive answers to a more or less precise need. It can be a call for projects, for a well identified business need, a call for expression of interest or a search for solutions for a benchmark.

The support program: generally proposed by partners, this is a call for applications intended to find candidates for an incubation, acceleration or other program.

Exclusive offers: These are promotional offers from our partners, especially for the Forinov community
Absolument toutes les startups sont en m:
Absolutely all startups are able to apply for opportunities, but before they are officially candidates, Forinov teams evaluate the seriousness of the profile to validate their registration on the platform. However, our teams do not have access to their answers to the forms, which are totally confidential.

Forinov relays your opportunity on numerous websites and media, but also on our networks and [on our directory pages]. You benefit from our referencing and reputation to receive the most relevant applications.
Les opportunités ne peuvent être publiée:
Opportunities can only be published by companies or partners who are members of Forinov.

Startups can apply, whether or not they are already members of the Forinov network. When applying, they also create a profile thanks to a simplified process. This will allow them to track their applications and stay in touch with you.

The link to your opportunities and all their important information (date, eligibility criteria, etc.) will be accessible and shareable via a public page
Les startups déjà membres bénéficient d':
Startups that are already members benefit from a simplified application process with 17 self-filling fields in their profile, which saves time and allows them to focus on answering your specific questions.

Startups not yet registered can apply directly through a unique simplified path to create their profile and apply at the same time.

Once their application is submitted, they can follow the status of their application (pending, accepted, etc.), contact you and of course update their profile to keep you informed of their news
